column4: Someone know, how much is a LTSP Server, Ubuntu Cloud and Virtual machine with Xen or other software?
No... i will do that for the company, and i want to know how much should i charge...
that one I cant tell you
you will have to work that out with your company people
can you explain further about this?   I am a bit confused
First i will make a LTSP Server, for many clients, i think... 20.
And the company did call me asking if i want to do that. But they ask for a price...

mm  I see... well.. I am not sure what to say... we are more of a support channel for issues arrising on ubuntu in terms of functionality and troubleshooting...  I am trying to think of a more appropriate channel to join
they may be able to help or at least point you in the right direction
not sure that channle is the right one  but  cant hurt to try :)
